project_descr: This project aims to strengthen the enabling environment within the responsible institutions to support the DRM mainstreaming into the agriculture sector and build livelihood resilience of farmers, livestock holders and fisherfolks against disasters.

outputs.output_descr: Strengthen the enabling environment within the responsible institutions to support the DRM mainstreaming into the agriculture sector and build livelihood resilience of farmers, livestock holders and fisherfolks against disasters.

document_name: Signed Project Document - Mainstreaming DRM/DRR in the Agriculture Sector in Guyana

project_title: mainstreaming drm/drr into the agriculture sector
